projects.title: PlaceLocal
projects.description: At PaperG, I've had the wonderful opportunity to develop tools to create and manage cross-platform programmatic creatives. Check out our promo video.

projects.title: WISDM
projects.description: With Jeremy Magland, PhD at University of Pennsylvania, we developed WISDM (Web-Interactive Scientific Data Manager) a cloud based solution for fMRI analysis and neuroimaging data sharing.

projects.title:
Pure CSS Mouse
Over Parallax
projects.description: A fun experiment that uses a pure CSS solution for mouse over parallax. The goal was to make a simple tutorial. There are plenty of guides out there on how to make pure CSS scrolling parallax but not for mouse over parallax.
